clause_text: My best friend pushed me into a lake
The incident occurred during our annual summer camping trip
We were enjoying a peaceful afternoon when it happened
My best friend pushed me into a lake
during our summer camping trip
We were having a peaceful afternoon
at our favorite spot in the woods
She dared me to catch a frog
she spotted near the water's edge
I refused the dare
as I was sitting down to eat my sandwich
My best friend pushed me into the lake
during our annual summer camping trip
We were at our favorite spot in the woods
enjoying a peaceful afternoon
She dared me to catch a frog near the water's edge
After I declined
she snuck up behind me
and nudged me into the water
My best friend pushed me into the lake
during our summer camping trip
She dared me to catch a frog near the water's edge
I refused the dare
as I was eating my sandwich
After being pushed
I laughed uncontrollably
when she handed me the frog
My best friend pushed me into the lake
during our annual summer camping trip
She dared me to catch a frog
and I refused
while eating my sandwich
After pushing me, she caught the frog
and handed it to me
as I got out of the water
I laughed
and vowed to get revenge on her
